translations.about-page.description: Founded in Cameroon with a mission to democratize tech entrepreneurship across Africa through open source AI technology.
translations.about-page.stats.label: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.about-page.mission.title: Democratizing Tech Entrepreneurship in Africa
translations.about-page.mission.description1: We believe every African entrepreneur deserves access to world-class AI tools without the prohibitive costs and complexity of traditional solutions.
translations.about-page.mission.description2: IDEM combines cutting-edge multi-agent AI architecture with open source principles to create a platform that's transparent, affordable, and built specifically for African needs.
translations.about-page.your_data_stays: Your data stays in Africa, under your control
translations.about-page.values.description: The principles that guide everything we do at IDEM
translations.about-page.value.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.about-page.journey.description: From inception to becoming Africa's leading sovereign AI platform
translations.about-page.milestone.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.about-page.vision.title: Empowering 1 Million African Entrepreneurs by 2035
translations.about-page.vision.description: We envision an Africa where every entrepreneur has the tools, knowledge, and support to transform their ideas into successful businesses using AI technology.
translations.about-page.contact.description: Get in touch with our team to discuss partnerships, collaborations, or just to say hello.
translations.about-page.values.africanFirst.title: African First
translations.about-page.values.africanFirst.descripti: Built in Cameroon for Africa. Every decision prioritizes African entrepreneurs and their unique needs.
translations.about-page.values.openSource.title: Open Source
translations.about-page.values.openSource.description: Complete transparency with Apache 2.0 license. No vendor lock-in, full control over your data.
translations.about-page.values.innovation.title: Innovation
translations.about-page.values.innovation.description: Pushing boundaries with multi-agent AI architecture and cutting-edge technology.
translations.about-page.values.community.title: Community
translations.about-page.values.community.description: Building together with African developers, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts.
translations.about-page.milestones.foundation.title: Foundation
translations.about-page.milestones.foundation.descrip: IDEM founded in Cameroon with a vision to democratize AI for African entrepreneurs
translations.about-page.milestones.mvp.title: MVP Launch
translations.about-page.milestones.mvp.description: First version released with core features: logo generation, business plans, and website builder
translations.about-page.milestones.openSource.title: Open Source
translations.about-page.milestones.openSource.descrip: Full codebase released under Apache 2.0 license, becoming Africa's first sovereign AI platform
translations.about-page.milestones.expansion.title: Pan-African Expansion
translations.about-page.milestones.expansion.descript: Expanding infrastructure across Africa with local data centers and partnerships
translations.about-page.seo.title: About IDEM | Africa's First Sovereign AI Platform
translations.about-page.seo.description: IDEM is Africa's first sovereign open source AI platform, founded in Cameroon. We democratize tech entrepreneurship by making world-class AI tools accessible and affordable for African entrepreneurs.
translations.about-page.seo.keywords: IDEM company, African AI startup, Cameroon tech, sovereign AI platform, African entrepreneurs, open source AI, tech innovation Africa, AI for Africa
